directions: Stir the chicken, mayonnaise, celery, pine nuts, lemon juice, relish, jalapeno pepper, and black pepper together in a mixing bowl until evenly blended. Cover, and refrigerate 20 to 30 minutes to allow the flavors to blend.
ingredients: 1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1/4 teaspoon cracked black pepper, or to taste
title: Chicken Salad Fit for a Dragon
